Translations.Text: When she bore eum she isolated faraway locus
Genitus process advenit eam trunk palm tree She dictus (ego est ashamed;) Ego wish ego est denatus ante hoc happened completely forgotten
(Infans) alias eam eam dictus non grieve Tuus Dominus provisus vos stream
Vos shake trunk de hoc palm tree it drop ripe datum vos
Eat drink est happy When vos vide anyone dictus â€˜ego factus vow silence ego non talking hodie anyone
She advenit eam familia carrying eum. They dictus O Mary vos committed something est totally unexpected
O descendant Aaron tuus patris non est malus vir nor est tuus mater unchaste
She pointed eum. They dictus Quam nos talk cum infans crib
infans spoke dictus ego est servus DEUS. He dedit me scripture appointed me prophet
He factus me beatus wherever ego iit enjoined me observe Contact Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat) prout long prout ego vivens
Ego est honor my mater He non factus me disobedient rebel
Pax est me feria ego est born feria ego abiit feria ego get resurrected
Est Jesus filius Mary hoc est truth hoc matter quae they continue doubt
It non befit DEUS ut He genitus est filius He glorified To habet anything perfecit He simply dictus to Est it est
He alias proclaimed DEUS est my Dominus tuus Dominus; vos worship Eum alone Hoc est rectus path
(various parties disputed themselves regarding identity Jesus). Ergo woe to those disbelieve sight terrible feria
Wait dum vos hear them vide them when they advenit face nos! transgressors ut feria totally lost
Warn them feria remorse when judgment proles. They est totally oblivious; they non believe
Nos est the unus inherit terra everyone it nos everyone returned
Mention scripture Abraham; he est saint prophet
He dictus to his patris O my patris vos worship quod potuit nec hear nor vide nor help vos in any via
O my patris ego received certain knowledge ut vos non receive subsequentis me ego guide vos straight path
O my patris non worship devil devil rebelled contra the Multus Gracious
O my patris ego fear lest vos incur retribution ex the Multus Gracious tunc become ally devil
He dictus vos forsaken my deus O Abraham? Vos stop ego stone vos. sinister me
He dictus Pax est vos. Ego implore my Dominus forgive vos; He est Generis me
Ego relinquit vos deus vos worship DEUS. Ego worship unus my Dominus. De imploring my Dominus alone ego non iit wrong
he relinquit them deus they worshipped DEUS nos granted eum Isaac Jacob nos factus each de them prophet
Nos showered them noster mercy nos granted them prenobilis position history
Mention scripture Moses He devoted he est messenger prophet
Nos alias eum rectus side Mount Sinai. Nos brought eum confer eum
Ac nos granted eum noster mercy his frater Aaron prophet
mention scripture Ismail! He est truthful when he factus promise he est messenger prophet
He used enjoin his familia observe Contact Prayers (Salat) obligatory charity (Zakat;) he est acceptable to his Dominus
mention scripture Idris! He est saint prophet
Nos levabat eum prenobilis rank

These est some de prophets whom DEUS beatus. They chosen descendants Adam descendants de those nos carried Noah descendants de Abraham Israel ex those nos guided selected When revelations the Multus Gracious est recited them they fall prostrate weeping
